snippet: It is the Jets and the Patriots’ turn to engage in the N.F.L.’s midweek tradition, and the Jets’ feelings about playing on Thursday remain mixed.
abstract: New York Jets and New England Patriots are about to engage in NFL’s midweek tradition, and the Jets’ feelings about playing on Thursday nights remain mixed; players express concerns about their health and the diluted quality of one of the most important games on the schedule, a divisional matchup, only four days later.
lead_paragraph: It is the Jets and the Patriots’ turn to engage in the N.F.L.’s midweek tradition, and the Jets’ feelings about playing on Thursday remain mixed.

headline.main: Jets Eager for Game, but Does It Have to Be on a Thursday?
headline.print_headline: Jets Eager for Game, but Does It Have to Be on a Thursday?
